original_title: EDB unveils flagship statistical publication ‘Export Performance Indicators 2022’
original_body_lines: The 36th volume of the flagship statistical publication ‘Export Performance Indicators 2022’ was recently unveiled by the Export Development Board of Sri Lanka.

The latest edition provides statistical information related to Sri Lanka’s external trade and its contribution to major economic indicators such as; trade balance, GDP, individual sectoral involvement, export regions per each product, their market growth and projected export forecast for the year 2022 and minimum five preceding years.
The publication and its previous editions have been constantly used as a comprehensive and trustworthy reference by exporters, researchers and policymakers.

EDB Chairman and CEO Dr. Kingsley Bernard thanked the Policy Strategic Planning team of the EDB for their invaluable effort in compiling the Export Performance Indicators 2022 and invited users of this publication to provide feedback on the content and suggestions for improvements.
Export Performance Indicators 2022 could be purchased using the following web link (https://www.srilankabusiness.com/publications/reports/).
